patterns: who should U.G. students contact for academic issue

who should i contact for under graduate related issues
responses: For under graduate  academics related issues, you can send your issues at ugone.acad@mnit.ac.in and ugtwo@mnit.ac.in

The under graduate academics related issues (of Electrical, Electronics, Mechanical, and Metallurgy branch) can be sent by students at ugtwo.acad@mnit.ac.in while students of computer science, civil, Architecture branch can send their issues at ugone.acad@mnit.ac.in
